nodes.text: CG-412 was a stormtrooper of the First Order. During the 709th Legion's deployment at Black Spire Outpost on Batuu, CG-412 spoke with fellow trooper LA-233, who complained about the warmth of the planet, pointing out that it could have been worse, and implied that CG-412 considered a frozen planet like Hoth to be worse by quoting their grandfather.
